title.label: Insanely addictive and fun puzzle game

content.label: I started playing this game at a sprint store on one of the phones. Goddamn was that game addictive. Got it as soon as I returned home and played to planet 5 until I was asked to write a review. The graphics are cartoony but very cool. I love this game. 5 stars.

In my opinion it‚Äôs quite a good game but very forgettable. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth the money. I forgot about it very fast. If it was free I would get it for the experience but overall just kinda meh!

Please make a encyclopedia for all the creatures that you have discovered in the game. I also want more aliens to save, and more monsters like big fish which can eat your aliens. It would be nice to have instead of more planets more galaxies. My final wish is bring back the alien from level 57 and put him in the alien space ship which is behind world 1, because when you win level 57 the green alien goes there and as soon as you go to another level and go to where you check how many aliens you have saved the green alien has vanished.

It‚Äôs a really fun game I recommend it if you like things like riddles, puzzles,crossword puzzles and things like that. It does make you think but it‚Äôs addicting the only thing I dislike is the small levels and there isn‚Äôt much of them but overall a AMAZING game üòÄüëçüèΩ

I like games like this, critical thinking games. More levels would be great
Best bucks I've spent in ages for a bit of fun. Love it!!

I don‚Äôt ever write game reviews, mostly because most of the games I play simply aren‚Äôt worth reviewing. Splitter critters is a gem, a masterpiece of a game, and I highly recommend that everyone here play it

I‚Äôm enjoying the game, best part is no internal purchases!!

A great puzzle game for on the go. The AR mode is fun except it‚Äôs hard to get your device just right. My only complaint is that $2.99 is a bit pricey. I could imagine it being free or $0.99, but not $2.99
There is something so great about this game. I haven‚Äôt finished an iOS game in forever, but I keep checking back for new lev is. Please make more!

This is an O.K game i downloaded it for my lil brother. Coonie Mini Critter

This game could have been more. It‚Äôs got a unique mechanic that separates it from the pack. Interesting tech must be running in the background to make the game mechanics possible. 

However, there is hardly any game here. The art is generic. It‚Äôs the typical cutesy fluff. The level design is severely lackluster and are almost copy-pastes of one another. I looked long and hard to find challenge, but my search came up empty.

Like I said, this game could have been something great, but the lack of substance and its forgettable nature prevents it from achieving greatness.

title.label: Unique game in a copy cat world

content.label: Kind of a choose your own adventure game. Tons of possible solutions for each puzzle. Reminds me of the Crayon Physics type games. Camera flow/zoom(or lack of) is a little off at times and doesn't keep the creatures or objectives in view, but I was still able to complete the level.

This is an excellent game, it brings unique mechanics that are perfect for 2d games. It reminds me a lot of portal, with augmented reality. In this game you guide critters to their spaceship while avoiding obstacles via splitting the screen to create pathways or to move the objects out of the way. In the last few levels there is a small spike in difficulty, but it is manageable. I do hope that the developers include more levels in future updates. It also has a decent soundtrack and sound effects. Definitely worth the price.
the game is totally fun and unlike anything ever played before. Only complaint is the first world is super easy and very had very fast.
Fun, clever game that makes you think.

I am very glad I purchased this game. I binged all the levels. I love way you all constructed this form of a puzzle, some of my favorite missions were on the moon and level 57 (the last planet closest to the sun). Having to reconstruct rather then tear apart the map like the other missions. But it‚Äôs so great all the effects. I hope more missions release soon! Looking forward to them!

On level 30 and still waiting for it to get harder. One challenging level so far otherwise mostly repeat of concepts. Looks great and awesome idea but just too easy. Feels a little like developers were more concerned with showing off level design than making a good puzzle. Good for .99 but I think 2.99 is sort of a next tier that this fails to hit.
The idea is awesome. The style is original, I‚Äôd say that it‚Äôs one of my favorite puzzle games. The AR mode is super cool. Totally worth my $3. Can‚Äôt wait for updates!!!

I love this game and would like to make some suggestions. Maybe you could add teleportation levels!!! You could also add levels with movable obstacles or other things like that. It‚Äôs just some ideas that I know you probably already thought of, but still think it could be a thing in a future update. Love the game btwüòèüòúü§óüòò
Such a great concept for a game I enjoy it quite a bit. The AR portion is pretty nifty as well.

title.label: Innovative mechanics. Fun levels. Wonderful design.

content.label: Really innovative concept. Ripping the world apart is just too much fun and I can‚Äôt get enough of these little critters! The AR levels are fantastic. When ever I‚Äôve seen an update has come out and just can‚Äôt wait to play it. I‚Äôm super excited to see what the new green critters powers are! Totally worth the 3$ dollars.
This is a very cute, and innovative puzzler

title.label: A Unique, Cute Little game for all ages!!!

content.label: Splitter Critters is an absolutely phenomenal game. It‚Äôs got really cute aesthetics and vibrant colors, as well as a simple to learn and understand gameplay mechanic. A great buy for those moments you just wanna enjoy something fun. Plus the AR functionality is really cool, and is probably one of the best I‚Äôve seen so far in terms of actual use.

I rarely buy games for my iPhone but I bought this one after my six year old nephew insisted we try it (he still loves saying SPLITTER CRITTERS). We had a lot of fun playing it. One of the few iPhone games that has hooked me and he also looks forward to playing it.
Excelente lo recomiendo ampliamente üáªüá™
I love the mechanics more planets and critter species would be amazing
A simple concept, but works miracles.

Unlike any app I‚Äôve downloaded until now for AR. This app is wonderful. MST of them have a weak AR part beside the main part which make AR part useless but this app has exclusive AR levels which are dramatically innovative and fun.
It is not the most difficult game ever, but it‚Äôs fun

This game is fun, but on the last level, I didn‚Äôt understand how to do it. I had to search up a YouTube video. I bought this app excited for AR but apparently you need a 6s or iPad Pro. I have a 5s. I beat the game it 3 days.

title.label: AR mode is a game changer.

content.label: The game itself is good but the AR mode makes it feel like I can become part of this game world. You can go inside the level itself and view all around.
Bad game

Great new concept.  Takes a bit to get used to the idea, but lots of fun.  Short levels so good for a break from other activities.  Highly recommend.  Also no in app purchases which is a nice change from a lot of current games.
Inventive, fun game.
